name: backbencher
content:
backbencher noun [C]
(MP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a member of the UK parliament who does not have any official position in the government or in one of the opposing parties: The advantage of being a backbencher is that you can speak your mind. Compare
frontbencher

backbencher noun [C]
(STUDENT)
Indian English (also back-bencher) a student who does not work hard or is not successful
